feed:
<%- page.blog_name %> <link href="<%= page.domain %>/rss.html" rel="self"/> <link href="<%= page.domain %>"/> <%= updateTime %> <%= page.domain %>
<%= siteInfo.website_author_name %>
wangwenbo.me <% list.forEach(function(post) { %>
<%- post.title %> <link href="<%= page.domain %>/<%= post.routename %>"/> <%= post.lastdate %> <%= page.domain %>/<%= post.routename %>

<% }) %>
